title: Epidemiological and clinical characteristics of patients with carbapenem-resistant Enterobacterales in a university hospital of Colombia: Enzyme coproductions in rise
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Juan Fernando Contreras-Valero, Sandra Milena Gualtero-Trujillo, Gloria Cecilia Cortés-Fraile, Sebastián Hernández-Garzón, Natalia Manrique-Marín, Miguel Ángel Narváez-Chaves, Sandra Liliana Valderrama-Beltrán
